entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is a champion and has a task to complete tonight. He is also referred to by his last name, Potter.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and is mentioned as being present with him at the Gryffindor table.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGo-nagall is a teacher who comes to speak to Harry and informs him about the champions' gathering.

entities.name: gryffindor table
entities.description: The Gryffindor table is mentioned as the location where Harry and Ron are sitting when Professor McGo-nagall approaches them.

entities.name: champions' families
entities.description: The champions' families are invited to watch the final task, according to Professor McGo-nagall.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's family and are mentioned as being unlikely to attend the gathering.

relationships.description: Professor McGo-nagall informs Harry about the champions' gathering and the reason for it.
Harry and Ron are friends, as indicated by their conversation at the Gryffindor table.
